RapidFit:
////////////////////////////////////////// // Reference file for fit to data //////////////////////////////////////////
//================================================ // Formal Parameters to be fitted or fixed
//........................................ // Parameters which can be fixed for Scans
//Fractions
SignalFractionUBU 0.68 0.5 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBT 0.60 0.5 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBU 0.73 0.5 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBT 0.63 0.5 1.0 Free Unitless
// Mass
alphaM_pr // exponent 0.0013 Free Unitless
f_sig_m1 // Fraction of first Gaussian 0.83 0.0 1.00001 Fixed Unitless
sigma_m1 // Gaussian width in MeV 6.5 0.0 100.0 Free MeV/c^{2}
ratio_21 2.14 1.0 10.0 Fixed MeV/c^{2}
m_Bs 5365.5 Free MeV/c^{2}
// LL lifetimes
f_LL1 // Fraction of first exponential 0.9921 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
tau_LL1 // First exponent 0.145 0.01 0.5 Free Unitless
tau_LL2 //Second exponent 0.994 0.05 3.0 Free Unitless
f_LL1_B 1.0 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
tau_LL1_B 0.370 0.01 1. Free Unitless
tau_LL2_B 0.0 0.00 0.0 Fixed Unitless
//.......................................... // Parameters which cant be fixed for scans
// True Physics Parameters for signal
gamma 0.662 0.0 10.0 Free ps^{-1}
deltaGamma 0.10 Free ps^{-1}
Aperp_sq 0.27 0. 1. Free Unitless
Azero_sq 0.49 Free 0. 1. Unitless
As_sq 0.00 0. 1. Free Unitless
delta_para 3.29 6.3 -6.3 Free Unitless
delta_perp 2.7 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
delta_zero 0.0 -3.3 3.3 Fixed Unitless
delta_s 3.0 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
deltaM 17.63 Free ps-1
Phi_s 0.17 Free Unitless
//.................................. // Detector Parameters
//Signal PDF time resolution parameters for double gaussian model.
timeResolutionScale 1.0 Free unitless
timeResolution1 0.0434 Fixed ps
timeResolution2 0.0853 Fixed ps
timeResolution3 0.513 Fixed ps
timeResolution2Fraction 0.165 Fixed unitless
timeResolution3Fraction 0.0017 Fixed unitless
timeOffset //Leave at Zero, this is not used anywhere yet. 0.000 Fixed ps
// Angular acceptance factors
angAccI1 #0.9792 0.9803 Fixed Unitless
angAccI2 #1.0308 1.0290 Fixed Unitless
angAccI3 #1.0293 1.0281 Fixed Unitless
angAccI4 #-0.0024 -0.0024 Fixed Unitless
angAccI5 #-0.0009 -0.0007 Fixed Unitless
angAccI6 #-0.0003 -0.0002 Fixed Unitless
angAccI7 #0.9931 0.9936 Fixed Unitless
angAccI8 #-0.0021 -0.0028 Fixed Unitless
angAccI9 #-0.0030 -0.0029 Fixed Unitless
angAccI10 #-0.0022 -0.0030 Fixed Unitless
// Mistag parameters
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1 1.037 Free
mistagP0 0.384 Free
mistagSetPoint 0.379 Fixed
//............................................ // Background model
//Long lived time resolution components
timeResLL1Frac 1.0 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL1 0.00 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL2 0.00 Fixed Unitless
//========================================== // Specify which minimiser to use.
Minuit 1000000 0.000001 1
NegativeLogLikelihoodThreaded #Petes
SWeightPrecalculator sWeight LP-Weights.root 2 // default
1
//========================================== // Specify the fit
//................................... // This applies a constraint on deltaM
deltaM 17.63 0.11
timeResolutionScale 1.0 0.04
// This applies a constraint on mistag scale
mistagP1 1.037 0.081
mistagP0 0.384 0.010
// .................... // Attempt to constrain LLscan on the amplitudes
ATOTAL 1.0 0.00001
// .................... // Attempt to constrain GH and GL positive
GLandGH 0.0 0.00001
//======================================== // UN-BIASED UN-TAGGED events
SignalFractionUBU # # #Bs2JpsiPhi_SignalAlt_MO_v4 #UseTimeAcceptance:True #TimeAcceptanceType:Upper #tag:tag_os #mistag:mistag_os #
BsMass
# # # #LongLivedBkg_3Dangular #AngularDistributionHistogram:2011-JPsiPhi-backgroundangles-tight-II-7x5x9.root #
Bs2JpsiPhiMassBkg
#
File $RAPIDFITDATA/Pass3-version2_Bs_310711_RapidFit.root DecayTree (sel==1) 1000000
time 0.3 14.0 ps
cosTheta -1.0 1.0
phi -3.14159 3.14159 rad
cosPsi -1.0 1.0
tag_os 0.0
mistag_os 0.5
timeAcceptanceCategory 0.0
mass 5200.0 5550.0 MeV/c^{2}
//======================================== // UN-BIASED OS TAGGED events
SignalFractionUBT # # #Bs2JpsiPhi_SignalAlt_MO_v4 #UseTimeAcceptance:True #TimeAcceptanceType:Upper #tag:tag_os #mistag:mistag_os #
BsMass
# # # #LongLivedBkg_3Dangular #AngularDistributionHistogram:2011-JPsiPhi-backgroundangles-tight-II-7x5x9.root #
Bs2JpsiPhiMassBkg
#
File $RAPIDFITDATA/Pass3-version2_Bs_310711_RapidFit.root DecayTree (sel==1) 10000000
time 0.3 14.0 ps
cosTheta -1.0 1.0
phi -3.14159 3.14159 rad
cosPsi -1.0 1.0
tag_os 1.0 -1.0
mistag_os 0.0 0.5
timeAcceptanceCategory 0.0
mass 5200.0 5550.0 MeV/c^{2}
//======================================== // BIASED UN-TAGGED events
SignalFractionBU # # #Bs2JpsiPhi_SignalAlt_MO_v4 #tag:tag_os #mistag:mistag_os #UseTimeAcceptance:True #TimeAcceptanceFile:2011-timeAcceptance-flattop-free-wUpper.txt #
BsMass
# # # #LongLivedBkg_3Dangular #AngularDistributionHistogram:2011-JPsiPhi-backgroundangles-tight-II-7x5x9.root #f_LL1:f_LL1_B #tau_LL1:tau_LL1_B #tau_LL2:tau_LL2_B #
Bs2JpsiPhiMassBkg
#
File $RAPIDFITDATA/Pass3-version2_Bs_310711_RapidFit.root DecayTree (sel==1) 1000000
time 0.3 14.0 ps
cosTheta -1.0 1.0
phi -3.14159 3.14159 rad
cosPsi -1.0 1.0
tag_os 0.0
mistag_os 0.5
timeAcceptanceCategory 1.0
mass 5200.0 5550.0 MeV/c^{2}
//======================================== // BIASED OS TAGGED events
SignalFractionBT # # #Bs2JpsiPhi_SignalAlt_MO_v4 #tag:tag_os #mistag:mistag_os #UseTimeAcceptance:True #TimeAcceptanceFile:2011-timeAcceptance-flattop-free-wUpper.txt #
BsMass
# # # #LongLivedBkg_3Dangular #AngularDistributionHistogram:2011-JPsiPhi-backgroundangles-tight-II-7x5x9.root #f_LL1:f_LL1_B #tau_LL1:tau_LL1_B #tau_LL2:tau_LL2_B #
Bs2JpsiPhiMassBkg
#
File $RAPIDFITDATA/Pass3-version2_Bs_310711_RapidFit.root DecayTree (sel==1) 10000000
time 0.3 14.0 ps
cosTheta -1.0 1.0
phi -3.14159 3.14159 rad
cosPsi -1.0 1.0
tag_os 1.0 -1.0
mistag_os 0.0 0.5
timeAcceptanceCategory 1.0
mass 5200.0 5550.0 MeV/c^{2}
#cosPsi
Phi_s -2.0 0. 20
